verbs.description: In another big lurch in efforts to [V: restrict] [ARG1: legal immigration] , Trump is mulling an order that would treat many people here legally as parasites .
In another big lurch in efforts to restrict legal immigration , Trump [V: is] mulling an order that would treat many people here legally as parasites .
[ARGM-LOC: In another big lurch in efforts to restrict legal immigration] , [ARG0: Trump] is [V: mulling] [ARG1: an order that would treat many people here legally as parasites] .
In another big lurch in efforts to restrict legal immigration , Trump is mulling an order that [V: would] treat many people here legally as parasites .

In another big lurch in efforts to restrict legal immigration , Trump is mulling [ARG0: an order] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: treat] [ARG1: many people here] [ARGM-MNR: legally] [ARG2: as parasites] .
